column1:
‚ÄúVegan Lime Light‚Äù is a refreshing, dairy-free ice cream that delivers
the perfect blend of creamy tofu, zesty lime, and silky soy milk in every bite.

A non-vegan variation with similar macros is replacing tofu, part of the soy milk, and the starch with
250g fat-free quark (or creamed cottage cheese) and 40ml cream (32%).
Spin on ‚ÄúLight Ice Cream‚Äù, scrape down, and re-mix.

1. Zest the lime(s), rub the zest into the sweetener, fill up with the juice and lemon liqueur.
 1. Let it rest in the fridge for a few hours.

1. Soften the tofu in the microwave with part of the milk.
 1. Blend together with the stabilizer mix until creamy and smooth.
 1. Add the rest of the milk, and the prepared zest.
 1. Use your blender on full speed to homogenize everything.

column13: 1 lime = 60..65g; optionally use 2 limes, or 1 lemon
Heat and blend with the tofu
If you have it, use silken tofu

column1: Salty Stability [Inulin / GMS / CMC / Guar / XG / Salt]

column13: use only if needed for more viscosity
